command.title: Consulta con JOIN y Agregaci√≥n
command.description: Une y agrega datos de ventas por fecha. [Source Table: FactSalesOrder; Joined Tables: DimDate]

part.desc: Conecta las ventas con sus fechas correspondientes.

command.full: SELECT d.[Year] AS CalendarYear, d.[Month] AS MonthOfYear, SUM(so.SalesTotal) AS SalesRevenue FROM FactSalesOrder AS so JOIN DimDate AS d ON so.SalesOrderDateKey = d.DateKey GROUP BY d.[Year], d.[Month], d.MonthName ORDER BY CalendarYear, MonthOfYear;
